name: A Mountain Day Hike in Washington's Cascades or Olympic Mountain Ranges  !!!
description: This trip will give you a once in a lifetime opportunity to hike and experience some of the country's last untamed lands. You will have breath taking views of surrounding mountains and valleys, as well as complete serenity. These hikes are fully guided including transportation, equipment, and food. Your guide is experienced, having worked  with  the national park service and with other recreation agencies, he has a variety of outdoor safety certifications and professional outdoor recreation work experiences.
